name: Tox-Mod
description: The Discord Bot with a Little Bit of Attitude

CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Discord Bot Client Secret for oAuth

DOMAIN.description: URL of your webserver (Example: https://domain.xyz). Change this if you want to use the web-dashboard.

IBL_AUTH.description: Authorization Token to post stats to https://infinitybotlist.com

PARADISE_AUTH.description: Authorization Token to post stats to https://paradisebots.net

SERVER_INV.description: Discord Invite for your Support Server

SERVER_ID.description: Discord Server ID for your Support Server

JOIN_LOGS.description: Channel ID to send Logs to when the Bot joins or leaves a server

AUTH_LOGS.description: Channel ID to send Logs to when someone logs in to the site

BAN_LOGS.description: Channel ID to send Logs to when a Banned user tries to access the site

BUG_LOGS.description: Channel ID to send Logs to for Bug Reports

ERR_LOGS.description: Channel ID to send Logs to when a Error occurs with the Website

OWNERS.description: Array of the Bot Owner(s) Discord IDs separated by Comas and Spaces (Ex: 1234567891011, 1234567891011)

DEVS.description: Array of the Bot Dev(s) Discord IDs separated by Comas and Spaces (Ex: 1234567891011, 1234567891011)

ADMINS.description: Array of the Bot Admin(s) Discord IDs separated by Comas and Spaces (Ex: 1234567891011, 1234567891011)

BETA_WL.description: Array of the Beta User(s) Discord IDs separated by Comas and Spaces (Ex: 1234567891011, 1234567891011)
